gremlins

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • gremlins.App
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants

    public class App
extends processing.core.PApplet
    App class responsible for running the game. Objects are loaded in, the logics are handled then objects are drawn to the applicaition window.

      • settings

        public void settings()
        Initialise the setting of the window size.
        Overrides:
        settings in class processing.core.PApplet

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Load all resources such as images. Initialise the elements such as the player, enemies and map elements. Arrays are cleared first as setup is ran multiple times. Load configs to get important values. Use configs to locate and initialise the map, then add objects to the relevant array.
        Overrides:
        setup in class processing.core.PApplet

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed()
        Receive key pressed signal from the keyboard.

        Overrides:

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Handles logic and remove relevant objects. Draw all elements in the game by current frame.
        Overrides:
        draw in class processing.core.PApplet
